revised_title: The Formation and Growth of Metallic Eutectics
tldr: The authors investigate the growth of metallic eutectics and classify them into two main classes based on their structure: spherical radiating growth and well-defined crystal contours with a herringbone structure. They also observe that the formation of halos or envelopes surrounding primary crystals is associated with eutectics of spherical growth, while eutectics with defined crystal contours do not exhibit this phenomenon.
